Documentation for ‘regrnd’ module¶

Documentation for the regrnd model class.

class regrnd.model(y, X, labels)[source]¶

Define a linear model with repeated observations.

Parameters:

y : array

1D array of phenotype observations

X : array

Design matrix for the fixed mean effects.

labels : array

1D array of sample labels
Returns:

model : regrnd.model

Methods

likelihood_and_gradient(alpha, sigma2, tau, l) Compute the loss function, which is -2 times the likelihood plus a L2 regularisation term,
optimize_model(l[, init_params]) Find the parameters that minimise the loss function for a given regularisation parameter
predict(X) Predict new observations based on model regression coefficients
set_alpha(alpha)
likelihood_and_gradient(alpha, sigma2, tau, l)[source]¶

Compute the loss function, which is -2 times the likelihood plus a L2 regularisation term, along with its gradient

Parameters:

alpha : array

value of the regression coefficients

sigma2 : float

variance of model residuals

tau : float

ratio of variance of model residuals to variance explained by mean differences between individuals
Returns:

L, grad : float

loss function and gradient, divided by sample size
optimize_model(l, init_params=None)[source]¶

Find the parameters that minimise the loss function for a given regularisation parameter

Parameters:

l : array

array of regularisation parameters for regression coefficients
Returns:

optim : list

the output of the scipy.fmin_l_bfgs_b function, first element has optimised parameters
predict(X)[source]¶

Predict new observations based on model regression coefficients

Parameters:

X : array

matrix of feature observations to predict from
Returns:

y : array

predicted values
regrnd.simulate(n, alpha, sigma2, tau)[source]¶
Simulate from a linear model with repeated observations from individuals. The mean for each individual
is drawn from a normal distribution.
Parameters:

n : int

sample size

alpha : array

value of regression coefficeints

sigma2 : float

variance of residuals

tau : float

ratio of variance of residuals to variance of distribution of between individual means
Returns:

model : regrnd.model

linear model with repeated observations
